source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT	DISTINCT
		SourceSystem = CASE WHEN LEFT(T.TABLE_NAME, 4) = 'AMEC' THEN 'Zoomget' ELSE 'Ammex' END,
		SourceDatabase = QUOTENAME(T.TABLE_CATALOG),
		SourceSchema = QUOTENAME(T.TABLE_SCHEMA),
		SourceObject = QUOTENAME(T.TABLE_NAME),
		SourceObjectType = CASE WHEN T.TABLE_TYPE = 'Base Table' THEN 'Table' ELSE T.TABLE_TYPE END,
		IngestRoot = 'ingest',	--'ammex-edw-synase-blob',
		IngestRootPath = CASE WHEN LEFT(T.TABLE_NAME, 4) = 'AMEC' THEN 'zoomget/delta' ELSE 'ammex/delta/' END + T.TABLE_SCHEMA + '.' + T.TABLE_NAME,		
		IngestRootPathFileName = T.TABLE_SCHEMA + '.' + T.TABLE_NAME,
		SinkSchema = QUOTENAME('Loader'),
		SinkTable =	QUOTENAME('Stage' + CASE WHEN LEFT(T.TABLE_NAME, 4) = 'AMEC' THEN 'Zoomget' ELSE 'Ammex' END + '_' + T.TABLE_NAME),
		SinkPreCopyScript = 'IF OBJECT_ID(''[Loader].[StageAmmex_' + T.TABLE_NAME + ']'') IS NOT NULL' + CHAR(13) + '   DROP TABLE [Loader].[StageAmmex_' + T.TABLE_NAME + '];',
		IsLoad = 0,
		LoadFrequency = 'Daily',
		LoadDate = GETDATE()

FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES T
WHERE T.TABLE_SCHEMA = 'DBO'	  
	  AND (LEFT(T.TABLE_NAME, 5) = 'Ammex'
		   OR LEFT(T.TABLE_NAME, 4) = 'AMEC')

sink.preCopyScript:
IF OBJECT_ID('[Loader].[AdfLoadControl]') IS NOT NULL
	   DROP TABLE [Loader].[AdfLoadControl];

scripts.text:
INSERT INTO [ETL].[AdfLoadControl]
	(  [SourceSystem], 
	   [SourceDatabase], 
	   [SourceSchema], 
	   [SourceObject], 
	   [SourceObjectType], 
	   [DatalakeIngestRoot], 
	   [DatalakeIngestRootPath], 
	   [DatalakeIngestRootPathFileName], 
	   [SinkSchema], 
	   [SinkTable], 
	   [SinkPreCopyScript], 
	   [IsLoad], 
	   [LoadFrequency], 
	   [LoadDate]
	)
SELECT 
       [SourceSystem], 
	   [SourceDatabase], 
	   [SourceSchema], 
	   [SourceObject], 
	   [SourceObjectType], 
	   [IngestRoot], 
	   [IngestRootPath], 
	   [IngestRootPathFileName], 
	   [SinkSchema], 
	   [SinkTable], 
	   [SinkPreCopyScript], 
	   [IsLoad], 
	   [LoadFrequency], 
	   [LoadDate]
FROM [Loader].[AdfLoadControl] SRC
WHERE [SourceSystem] = 'Ammex'
	  AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1
					  FROM [ETL].[AdfLoadControl] DST
					  WHERE SRC.[SourceSystem] = DST.[SourceSystem]
							AND SRC.[SourceDatabase] = DST.[SourceDatabase]
							AND SRC.[SourceObject] = DST.[SourceObject]
					 )

INSERT INTO [ETL].[AdfLoadControl]
	(  [SourceSystem], 
	   [SourceDatabase], 
	   [SourceSchema], 
	   [SourceObject], 
	   [SourceObjectType], 
	   [DatalakeIngestRoot], 
	   [DatalakeIngestRootPath], 
	   [DatalakeIngestRootPathFileName], 
	   [SinkSchema], 
	   [SinkTable], 
	   [SinkPreCopyScript], 
	   [IsLoad], 
	   [LoadFrequency], 
	   [LoadDate]
	)
SELECT 
       [SourceSystem], 
	   [SourceDatabase], 
	   [SourceSchema], 
	   [SourceObject], 
	   [SourceObjectType], 
	   [IngestRoot], 
	   [IngestRootPath], 
	   [IngestRootPathFileName], 
	   [SinkSchema], 
	   [SinkTable], 
	   [SinkPreCopyScript], 
	   [IsLoad], 
	   [LoadFrequency], 
	   [LoadDate]
FROM [Loader].[AdfLoadControl] SRC
WHERE [SourceSystem] = 'Zoomget'
	  AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1
					  FROM [ETL].[AdfLoadControl] DST
					  WHERE SRC.[SourceSystem] = DST.[SourceSystem]
							AND SRC.[SourceDatabase] = DST.[SourceDatabase]
							AND SRC.[SourceObject] = DST.[SourceObject]
					 )
